scene_description_enriched: A woman, depicted with a head covering and flowing hair, is shown seated and engaged in an activity. She holds a pair of scissors in her right hand, poised to cut a piece of fabric or material that is draped over her lap. Beneath her hands, a small animal, possibly a lamb or a dog, is visible, with its head turned upwards. To the right of the woman, a stylized plant or branch with leaves is depicted. The scene is framed by decorative elements at the top, suggesting an ornamental border.
